activities: The personal data will be kept until the member requests to be de-registered.  The information will be used as the member's identity (avatar) to facilitate online social networking activities including networking with other members, finding and posting jobs and projects. The member will have access to privacy setting tools to allow them to decide what information they would want to display and to whom.
